steps.name: status 200 # the status code response should be 200
match response.[0].empID == '#notpresent'
comments: #Make sure that the below property or key is not present

steps.name: match response.[0].experience == '#[]'
comments: #To validate the array or that its array type

steps.name: match response.[0].experience == '#[3]'
comments: #To validate the size of the array

steps.name: match response.[0].experience == '#[3] #string? _.length>=2'
comments: #make sure its array of strings and length of each string is greater than 2

name: com/api/automation/getrequest/validateJSONFuzzyMatcher.feature
description:
To test the get end point of the application
To test different get end point with different formats supported by the application
